nodes.text: Traveler's Guide to Batuu was a travel guide for the planet Batuu written by galactic explorer Eloc Throno. It was subtitled "Black Spire Outpost and Beyond." Throno was extremely fond of the planet and updated the guide more than once.

The Traveler's Guide to Batuu appeared in the form of its real-world equivalent, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu. It was written by Cole Horton, in the guise of in-universe character Eloc Throno. The book serves as a guide to Disney Parks' Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge.
